summary: "Possession" is a 1981 horror movie directed by Andrzej Żuławski. It's about a spy and his wife who wants a divorce. She starts acting very strangely, which is scary. The film was made in West Berlin and is based on Żuławski's own divorce experience. It didn't do well in theaters but has become a cult classic over time. Isabelle Adjani won an award for her acting at the Cannes Film Festival.
title: Possession (1981 film)
